Constructor Detail

Driver

public Driver()
Constructor for Driver objects. At the moment, simply instantiates a new driver and calls its start() method.

Entry point into the program

start

private void start()
Handles the assignment objectives: // Step 2: Traverse the list, print the service types in this format: // Service Type: Brake at index 0 // Service Type: Tire at Index 1.... // This step should be done in a method // Step 3: Remove All brake services from the Arraylist // Step 4: Do Step 2 // Step 5: Replace All Tires services and replace with Radiator services. // Step 6: Do Step 2 // Step 7 : Insert A brake Service at 4th index // Step 8: Do Step 2

insertService

private static void insertService(int serviceToInsert,
                                  int location)
Inserts a new service into the service list.

Parameters:
serviceToInsert - Code for the service to insert. (See static final ints of Driver class)
location - Index in which to place the new service.

replaceServices

public static void replaceServices(int serviceToRemove,
                                   int serviceToSub)
Replaces all of one type of service with another type.

Parameters:
serviceToRemove - Code for service to remove.
serviceToSub - Code for service that will replace the removed service.

deleteServices

public static void deleteServices(int serviceToRemove)
Deletes all of one type of service.

Parameters:
serviceToRemove - Code for service type to be deleted.

printServiceTypes

public static void printServiceTypes()
Iterates the service array and passes each service along to a print formatter. Call this anytime you want to display a full list of all services and associated data.

populateServiceList

private static void populateServiceList()
Initializes the service list with randomized services. Takes care of assigning a random mechanic, service date, and associated car, and prints the results.

printHeader

private static void printHeader()
A simple header to identify columns when printing.

printIndividualServiceOutput

private static void printIndividualServiceOutput(Service p)
Pass this method a service to print all of its associated data.

Parameters:
p - Service to be printed. #TODO: Maybe make the service's toString take care of this..?

checkForCoupons

private static void checkForCoupons()
Iterates over the service list and applies any relevant coupons.

printFinalTally

private static void printFinalTally()
Prints static total related to the entire shop, such as total services and net prices.

getRandomVIN

private static java.lang.String getRandomVIN()
Generates random VIN numbers for cars.

Returns:
Returns a string conforming to the following rules: First 4 characters - Letters between A and Z Last 4 characters - Numbers between 0 and 9

getRandomMiles

private static int getRandomMiles()
Returns:
Returns a random number of miles bounded by MAX_MILES, defined in the Driver class.

getRandomServiceDate

private static java.util.GregorianCalendar getRandomServiceDate()
Constructs a calendar object within certain confines defined in the Driver class.

Returns:
A calendar object within a specific timeframe.

getService

private static Service getService(int whichService)
Wrapper for generating services. Also handles incrementing net totals. #TODO: This probably shouldn't handle net totals. :)

Parameters:
whichService - Code for the service you need, or a random number between 0 and 4
Returns:
Returns a new service object.
